member.name: T:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions
member.summary: Represent all the options for search command"/>

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.IgnoreCache
member.summary: If the query will be ignore the cache database

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.IgnoreUpdate
member.summary: If the cache database update will be ignored

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.ForceUpdate
member.summary: If the cache database will be forced to update

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.CaseSensitive
member.summary: If case sensitive will be used

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.BypassProxy
member.summary: If the default proxy will be ignored

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Max time for get an answer of the engine

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.Limit
member.summary: Max entities to return from a query

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.Export
member.summary: Path with the extension of the file to be exported

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.Password
member.summary: Password or hash to be searched

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.PasswordList
member.summary: Password and/or hash wordlist to be searched

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.UserList
member.summary: User, username or email address wordlist

member.name: P:CredentialCat.Console.Entities.SearchCommandOptions.Origin
member.summary: If present, search on cache database with specific origin
